name: The Lyogslate
title: Corrupted Shell
abilityWindow: After a player gains control of a planet:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to ready that planet.

name: The Yehiga
title: The Learning Algorithm
abilityText: After you gain control of a planet: You may produce 1 unit in that planet's system.
unlockCondition: Gain control of a planet that was owned by another player.

name: The Cantokylegance
title: Psyo-Machine
abilityWindow: When another player would purge their hero
abilityText: You may purge this card instead, their hero has no effect, is not purged, and is treated as blank until the end of this game round.

name: Xeyhotph
title: Hand of the Void
abilityWindow: After a player activates a system:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to treat 1 of their units as adjacent to the active system.

name: Oilinephophete
title: Eyes of the Void
abilityWindow: At the start of the status phase
abilityText: Gain a number of commodities equal to the number of systems that contain 1 or more of your units and no planets.
unlockCondition: Have units in 3 systems that do not contain planets.

name: Quolocin
title: Voice of the Void
abilityName: Void Caller - Maw of the Abysse
abilityWindow: After you move your flagship into a non-home system other than Mecatol Rex:
abilityText: You may destroy all other players' units in that system and replace that system tile with the Eidolon gravity rift tile. If you do, purge this card and each planet card that corresponds to the replaced system tile.

name: That Which Gives
title: Shadow of Eccon V
abilityWindow: At the start of a space combat
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow the defender to choose 1 of their opponent’s ships to place 1 ship of that type from their reinforcements in the active system.

name: That Which Tolls
title: Shadow of Tyria Prime
abilityWindow: At the start of space combat
abilityText: You may place 1 ship from your reinforcements with a cost of no more than 4 matching the type of 1 of your opponents’ ship in that system. (you may use influence to build if you want)

name: That Which Reaps
title: Second Shadow
abilityText: Choose a non-home planet other than Mecatol Rex controlled by another player in a system that contains at least 1 or more of your units. Destroy all of that player's units on that planet. Place the “Grave World” token on that planet. Gain that planets' card and attach this card to that planet, you cannot lose this card.

name: Volakanite
title: Infokite of the VI Legion
abilityText: This card has the Tier 1 text ability of each active protocol.

name: That Which Tolls
title: Shadow of Tyria Prime
abilityText: This card has the Tier 2 ability of each active protocol.
unlockCondition: Have units with a combined PRODUCTION value of at least 10 in a single system.

name: Maelothope
title: Commander of Legion I
abilityName: Deliverance Protocols - The Will Made Manifest
abilityText: This card has the Tier 3 text ability of each active protocol. When you use this ability, purge this card.

name: Kane'Ikala
title: Angel of Prosperity
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow any player to spend influence as if it were resources.

name: Zyrial'Ayri
title: Angel of Warning
abilityWindow: After a player exhausts at least 1 planet to cast any number of votes:
abilityText: That player casts 5 additional votes. Then, exhaust this card.

name: Ells'Arish
title: Angel of Protection
abilityWindow: When a player's unit would be destroyed:
abilityText: Exhaust this card, that unit is not destroyed.

name: Asyhil'Sim
title: Angel of Order
abilityWindow: At the start of each round of space combat:
abilityText: Your opponent must destroy one of their fighters if able.
unlockCondition: Have at least 1 cruiser in 4 systems.

name: Elishen'Rine
title: Angel of Deliverance
abilityWindow: After you move your flagship into a non-home system other than Mecatol Rex:
abilityText: You may destroy all other players' units in that system and replace that system tile with the Saeraphyme nebula tile. If you do, purge this card and each planet card that corresponds to the replaced system tile. Then, move any number of your ships into this system.
